entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
